message:
Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker's security detail is taking every measure necessary to ensure his safety, a state official told FoxNews.com, as protests over the governor's budget bill spread and some of the rhetoric being used gets overheated. 

"A number of Twitter users, apparently unhappy with the budget plan, have publicly pleaded for somebody to kill Walker. 'Someone please shoot him?!' one user Tweeted. 'Crazy people wanted!!!! Please have sniper skills,' another wrote, later adding: 'Some one please take out the governor Scott Walker.'" 

http://www.foxnews.com/politics/2011/02/23/wisconsin-security-tight-rhetoric-takes-inflammatory-turn/
